overview: Home Movies is a fresh, sex-packed action video with 10 new handsome young men. Featuring: * Blond-haired, blue-eyed, all-American college jock Danny Morgan who is a lanky 6'4", 185 lb swimmer with an incredibly thick 12 inch cock * Michael Keenan, a sexy well-endowed Australian brunet with broad shoulders and beautiful lips * Irish exchange student Billy Flynn with his golden hair, washboard stomach, perfectly proportioned body, and size 14 sneaker Home Movies combines five arousing encounters including an unsuccessful date which enables Jim Clayton to seduce his sister's boyfriend Michael Keenan while  Billy Flynn gets caught with his pants down by his classmate who learns why the Irish are called lucky!
title: Home Movies
